name: Flummot
content:
Flummot was a Male Toydarian fence that operated out of Gandanta Station. Flummot hired some muscle as protection while he dealt with Black Sun agents who had acquired artwork from the Tion Hegemony, though was injured when the deal was interrupted. He had a chance cube fitted with a homing beacon.
Flummot appeared in the role-playing sourcebook Far Horizons released in 2014 and developed by Sam Stewart.
